data.description: This Requirement Document (RD) defines the requirements for the Push to Talk over Cellular. This document captures the overall service description, primarily from the service subscriber's and user's points of view, but its scope does not include the details of the human interface itself. The information contained in this RD is applicable to network operators, service providers and terminal and infrastructure manufacturers. This RD contains the core requirements for the Push to Talk over Cellular enabler as specified by OMA. By means of this enabler, together with other OMA service enablers, a service provider SHALL be able to provide a complete service. The term PoC in this document refers to the Push to Talk over Cellular enabler offered via an OMA compatible environment.
